scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test:all
scripts.build:ar: npm run lint:ar && npm run test:ar
scripts.build:rr: npm run lint:rr && npm run test:rr
scripts.build:ts:ar: npm run lint:ts:ar && npm run test:ts:ar
scripts.build:ts:rr: npm run lint:ts:rr && npm run test:ts:rr
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ar && npm run test:rr && npm run test:ts:ar && npm run test:ts:rr
scripts.prepub:ar: npm run build:ar && npm run license:ar && npm run version:ar
scripts.prepub:rr: npm run build:rr && npm run license:rr && npm run version:rr
scripts.prepub:ts:ar: npm run build:ts:ar && npm run license:ts:ar && npm run version:ts:ar
scripts.prepub:ts:rr: npm run build:ts:rr && npm run license:ts:rr && npm run version:ts:rr
scripts.prepub:all: npm run prepub:ar && npm run prepub:rr && npm run prepub:ts:rr && npm run prepub:ts:rr
scripts.publish:ar: npm run prepub:ar && cd all-rules && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:rr: npm run prepub:rr && cd recommended-rules && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:base && npm run publish:cc && npm run publish:pc
